class tau.cf.bfd.Bfd(prefix, cxx, src, arch)[source]¶

Bases: object

Encapsulates a BFD installation

applyCompiletimeConfig(opts, env)[source]¶

TODO: Docs

getRuntimeConfig(opts, env)[source]¶

TODO: Docs

install(force_reinstall=False)[source]¶

TODO: Docs

verify()[source]¶

Returns true if if there is a working BFD installation at prefix with a directory named arch containing lib directories or raises a ConfigurationError describing why that installation is broken.

verify()[source]¶

Returns true if if there is a working PDT installation at prefix with a directory named arch containing bin and lib directories or raises a ConfigurationError describing why that installation is broken.

tau.cf.scorep.verifyInstallation(prefix, arch, cc=None, cxx=None, fortran=None)[source]¶
